ActorFrame.OnCommand: %function(self) upsh_bgcock = self self:fov(40); self:SetDrawByZPosition(true); self:SetFarDist(9999); end

Layer.OnCommand:
%function(self) upsh_black = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) self:zoomto(SCREEN_WIDTH,SCREEN_HEIGHT)
self:diffuse(0,0,0,1) end
%function(self) upsh_gradorange = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) self:zoomto(SCREEN_WIDTH,SCREEN_HEIGHT) self:diffusealpha(0) end
%function(self) upsh_gradblue = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) self:zoomto(SCREEN_WIDTH,SCREEN_HEIGHT) self:diffusealpha(0) end
%function(self) upsh_arrow = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) self:diffusealpha(0) end
%function(self) upsh_arrow2 = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+500) self:diffusealpha(0) end

%function(self) upsh_tile1 = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+60) self:diffusealpha(0)
self:customtexturerect(0,0,15,15) self:texcoordvelocity(0,0.2,0) self:zoom(20) self:zoomz(40)
self:SetTextureFiltering(false)
self:rotationx(-80) end
%function(self) upsh_grad = self self:zoomtowidth(SCREEN_WIDTH) self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y+20) end
